function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of 5G-based driverless vehicles and unmanned distribution robots for delivery may lead to increased potential for disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to contact with contaminated surfaces during delivery.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for vehicle and robot maintenance and disinfection.","Technologies":"Use of UV-C light disinfection systems and antimicrobial materials for vehicle and robot surfaces.","People":"Home-locked residents","Owner":"Logistics companies, technology developers"},{"Description":"High engagement with 5G applications may lead to increased social interaction and close contact, potentially increasing disease transmission.","Impact":"Greater risk of virus spread due to social gatherings and physical interaction.","Mitigation":"Promote virtual social engagement and entertainment options to reduce in-person gatherings and interactions.","Technologies":"Virtual reality (VR) entertainment platforms, online streaming services, and social media engagement tools.","People":"Home-locked residents","Owner":"Telecommunications companies, entertainment platforms"},{"Description":"Reliance on 5G-based telemedicine for medical services may lead to increased dependency and potential strain on the telemedicine infrastructure.","Impact":"Risk of overloading telemedicine systems and delays in critical medical consultations.","Mitigation":"Expand telemedicine capacity and establish backup systems to handle increased demand during a crisis.","Technologies":"Cloud-based telemedicine platforms, AI triage systems for remote consultations, and telemedicine network optimization.","People":"Home-locked residents, healthcare providers","Owner":"Telemedicine companies, healthcare organizations"}]}
